mkace2d module¶

Make an atitude control error map

usage:

mkace2d.py [-h|–help] -x aX.fits -y aY.fits -v xs -w ys -p ps -n N -o out.fits

options:
--help

show this help message and exit

-x aX.fits X-axis simulated ACE file -v xs aX.fits is scaled by xs -y aY.fits Y-axis simulated ACE file -w ys aY.fits is scaled by ys -n N output image is N x N -p ps pixel scale of Output image -o out.fits output image file

Next topic
